ygData.subject: Re: Lady Shae Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: This may or may not be broken. If it was broken before, it may not be now since the last patch. I have noticed several small changes to certain lines of text
ygData.messageBody:
This may or may not be broken. If it was broken
before, it may not be now since the last patch. I have
noticed several small changes to certain lines of text
when you speak to NPCs now.

Many have thought Shae to be broken because when you
killed her, she never dropped the note.
BUT, if you read your instructions carefully, you are
never actually told to kill her. You are told to go
find her and you are given a phrase to say to her.
Which of course you wont get a response from because
you faction with her is horrible.

But that is now. Before the patch i could trigger her
even though she was threatening to me. She tells you
what happened to the note she was carrying.

The hard part is finding Dyllin when he has this part
of the note. If you kill him in HH, he has a different
part, NOT the one that Shae is supposed to have.

Thus my need to know if there is a way to get him to
spawn at the lake. (Unless the person who stated that
was mistaken).


Btahory D'Allatu
